title: Conceptual Tool Utilization Strategies in Simulation-Based Mathematics Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics theory and basic proficiency in simulation tools
context.additional_context: Pre-professionals in medical/legal/technical fields learn to design mathematical problem-solving processes in VR simulation environments; collaborative project-based learning utilizing BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)

learning_goals: Learners can solve mathematical problems that may occur in real workplace scenarios by utilizing conceptual tools (learning theories/design models) in VR simulation environments.
Learners can analyze difficulties in applying theory and develop strategies to link it with intuitive judgment.
Learners can demonstrate and improve the results of utilizing conceptual tools through project-based assessments as members of small teams.

resources: Mathematics and Design Theory Reference Textbook

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
